name: get_portfolios_alt1
description: Get all the portfolios that belong to a user

direction.description: The sort direction of the results.

page.description: The page number of the results to show.

per_page.description: The number of items to show on each page of results, up to a maximum of 100.

query.description: The search query to use to filter the results.

sort.description: The way to sort the results.

$ul: **created_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the portfolio was created.
**connections**: A list of resource URIs related to the album.
**videos**: Information about the videos contained within this portfolio.
**options**: An array of HTTP methods permitted on this URI.
**total**: The total number of videos on this connection.
**uri**: The API URI that resolves to the connection data.
**modified_time**: The time in ISO 8601 format when the portfolio's data was last modified.
**name**: The display name of the portfolio.
**sort**: The default video sort order for the portfolio:
**uri**: The canonical relative URI of the portfolio.
